key_risks: Legal and financial risks from software infringement litigation and shareholder investigations
Economic sensitivity due to reliance on infrastructure spending
Intense competition from major players like Autodesk, Trimble, and Dassault Systèmes
Challenges in transitioning customers to subscription-based and cloud services
Data privacy and security concerns in cloud-based solutions
controversies: Software infringement litigation and potential securities law violations
Over-usage billing concerns with automatic prorated charges
environmental_issues: Commitment to sustainability initiatives and tools for sustainable infrastructure design
social_issues: Data privacy and cybersecurity concerns impacting customer trust
governance_issues: Shareholder investigations into potential breaches of fiduciary duty by officers and directors
